In this phase, she's really hard to kill but barely deals any damage herself as she can't use her skills.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As the barrier state loses strength, A. Her damage output and utility is scary and justifies her deployment cost, but two things make her borderline overpowered: the range on her special and ultimate is very large, with the special skill grouping up enemies, locking their buffs, and resetting its own CD. description.description: A Ranger who can control the battlefield with Ice magic.

introduction.introduction:
종신 학회장 레지나 맥크레디는 적을 빙결시킨 후 영구적으로 증가한 공격력으로 치명적인 공격을 가하는 레인저입니다.
에크하르트 초월지식 학회는 오랜 세월에 걸쳐 세력을 확장해 온 음모론적 조직입니다. 호수에 대한 광기로 수많은 적을 만들었고, 그럼에도 역사 속에서 여러 이름 뒤에 숨어 끈질기게 명맥을 이어 왔습니다.
그리고 이제, 학회는 새로운 지도자와 새로운 시대를 앞두고 있습니다. 변화를 몰고 올 폭풍은 살을 에듯 차고 고통스러울지 모르나, 결국 누구도 거부할 수 없게 될 것입니다.

baseDescription.baseDescription:
Deals damage to enemies using ice attacks. When [Ice barrier] is active, summon Ice Vortex to attack enemies. Adds 1 stack of [Chill] per hit. Does not deal damage to targets exceeding valid hit.

[Chill] Each stack reduces SPD/ASPD by 3% per stack, up to 20 stacks, the effect lasts 5 seconds. Upon 20 stacks, the effect changes to [Freeze].

[Freeze] Unable to act for 5s. Knockback/Airborne immune. Unable to accumulate [Chill] under the effect. Boss excluded.

level5.level5: Summons a sustained Ice Vortex after [Ice Barrier] is removed. (After casting Ultimate, Ice vortex damage is affected by Ultimate DMG Increase)

baseDescription.baseDescription: Unaffected by Chill or Freeze. Casts the [Ice barrier] when deployed (Cannot be canceled). When [Ice barrier] is active, becomes immune to all Hitstun, Sleep, and Stun. When [Ice barrier] is active, gain 100% HP but continuously lose HP per second (up to 30%/s) and continuously gain ATK (up to 150%). [Ice barrier] is removed after falling below 50% HP, dealing AoE damage around her and adding 5 stacks of [Chill] to damaged enemies.

level5.level5: When [Ice barrier] is removed, gains 100% Knockback RES. The effect is removed after taking 12 hits (Activated again after casting ultimate).

baseDescription.baseDescription: Unable to cast during [Ice barrier]. Deals AoE damage in front and each hit adds 1 stack of [Chill] to damaged enemies. If the target is affected by [Freeze], release the effect from them to deal additional damage and increase the cooldown of their skills by 8 seconds. When a target affected by [Freeze] is detected, ignore the skill's cooldown and cast the skill.

level5.level5: Enemies within the range have their buffs nullified for 6 seconds.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Unable to cast during [Ice barrier]. Adds 20 stacks of [Chill] to all enemies over 3 second. Deals AoE damage in front and the last 3 attacks deal true damage. Each hit adds 1 stack of [Chill]. Targets affected by [Freeze] receive additional damage equal to 30% of their max HP and release [Freeze] on them (bosses excluded).

level5.level5: When attacking enemy affected by [Freeze], seal their skills for 12s.
